title: Ticket #6297: Pslot preemption should handle custom resources
description: Currently, pslot preemption only considers cpus, memory, and disk when consolidating the resources of dslots into the pslot to attempt a match. It should also consider custom resources, if they're configured. GPUs are a common custom resource that this would be useful for.
